external_games.name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 7

name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect: Expansion Pack 7
summary: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 7 game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect - Expansion Pack 7 is designed for adults and for kids.
